info.title: Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops Rest API for Developer Portal

get.summary: GET the machines of a catalog

parameters.name: nameOrId
parameters.description: Name or ID of the machine catalog

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
The max number of machines returned by this query.
If not specified, the server might use a default limit of 250 items.
If the specified value is larger than 1000, the server might reject the call.
The default and maximum values depend on server settings.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description:
If a query cannot be completed, the response will have a
ContinuationToken set.
To obtain more results from the query, pass the
continuation token back into the query to get the next
batch of results.

parameters.name: async
parameters.description: If `true`, it will be queried as a background task.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Optional parameters, only the specified properties in the fields are required.

parameters.name: Citrix-CustomerId
parameters.description: Citrix Cloud Customer ID.

parameters.name: Citrix-InstanceId
parameters.description: Citrix Cloud Instance (Site) ID.

parameters.name: User-Agent
parameters.description: User Agent type of the request.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Citrix Cloud authorization header: CWSAuth Bearer={token}

parameters.name: Citrix-TransactionId
parameters.description: Transaction ID that will be used to track this request. If not provided, a new GUID will be generated and returned.

parameters.name: X-ActionName
parameters.description: Orchestration Action Name

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Must accept application/json.

parameters.name: Citrix-Locale
parameters.description: Locale of the request.

200.description: The machines of the given machine catalog identifier

Citrix-TransactionId.description: Transaction ID that is either provided by caller with the same request header or newly created.

Content-Type.description: Response Content Type. Value is always 'application/json'.

X-Content-Type-Options.description: Content type options. Value is always 'nosniff'.

Content-Language.description: Content language. Value is either 'en-US' or based on client language setting.

Cache-Control.description: Cache Control. Value is always 'no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate.'

Citrix-FilterScope.description: Optional filter scope for getting scoped objects.

post.summary: Add machine to the machine catalog.
post.description:
Add a machine to the machine catalog.  This is the first step in making the
machine available to run users' desktops and applications. The machine may
be physical or virtual.  The type of machine (physical or virtual) must
match the machine catalog configuration.


Note that due to
the long-running nature of the adding operation, it cannot
complete synchronously, would always initiate an asynchronous job to
run to completion.


The machine must support the expected capabilities of the machine catalog:
the  and
. The session
support of the machine is determined by the type of Citrix VDA software
installed (server or workstation) and the functional level depends on the
version of the Citrix VDA software installed.  The API will complete
successfully if these are not correct but the machine will be unable to register.


Note: to add multiple machines in a single call, use the
 API.

parameters.name: nameOrId
parameters.description: Name or ID of the machine catalog to add machine to.

parameters.name: async
parameters.description:
If `true`, the machine will be added into the machine catalog as a background task.
The task will have JobType AddMachineCatalogMachine.
When the task is complete it will redirect to
GetMachineCatalog.
The job's Parameters will contain properties:
* _NameOrId_ - Name or ID of the machine being added.

parameters.name: Citrix-CustomerId
parameters.description: Citrix Cloud Customer ID.

parameters.name: Citrix-InstanceId
parameters.description: Citrix Cloud Instance (Site) ID.

parameters.name: User-Agent
parameters.description: User Agent type of the request.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Citrix Cloud authorization header: CWSAuth Bearer={token}

parameters.name: Citrix-TransactionId
parameters.description: Transaction ID that will be used to track this request. If not provided, a new GUID will be generated and returned.

parameters.name: X-AdminCredential
parameters.description:
Admin credential to use when performing the operation. If not specified, the operation will be performed using the account under which the identity service is running If specified, must be in a format matching that of the standard 'Authorization' request header; the username and password separated by a colon, UTF8-encoded, then base64-encoded, then the "Basic " scheme prepended.
Example:Basic QWxhZGRpbjpPcGVuU2VzYW1l

parameters.name: X-ActionName
parameters.description: Orchestration Action Name

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Must accept application/json.

parameters.name: Citrix-Locale
parameters.description: Locale of the request.

requestBody.description: Details of the machine to add to the machine catalog.

Citrix-TransactionId.description: Transaction ID that is either provided by caller with the same request header or newly created.

allOf.description: Response object for collections of MachineResponseMode.

CollectionModelOfMachineResponseModel.title: CollectionModel`1
CollectionModelOfMachineResponseModel.description: Response object for collections of items.

ContinuationToken.title: String
ContinuationToken.description:
If present, indicates to the caller that the query was not complete,
and they should call the API again specifying the continuation token
as a query parameter.

TotalItems.title: Int32
TotalItems.description:
Indicates the total number of items in the collection, which may be
more than the number of Items returned, if there is a
ContinuationToken.  Only returned in the response to `$search` APIs.

Uid.title: Int32
Uid.description:
DEPRECATED. Use Id.
Used to be: DesktopUid

AgentVersion.title: String
AgentVersion.description: Version of the Citrix Virtual Delivery Agent (VDA) installed on the machine.

AllocationType.description: Describes how the machine is allocated to the user.

ApplicationsInUse.title: RefResponseModel[]
ApplicationsInUse.description: List of applications in use in the session.

AssignedUsers.title: IdentityUserResponseModel[]
AssignedUsers.description:
List of one or more users to whom the machine is assigned.
Only used when AllocationType
is equal to Static.

AssociatedUsers.title: IdentityUserResponseModel[]
AssociatedUsers.description: The current user(s) for shared machines and the assigned users for private machines.

AzureAdJoinedMode.description: The type of Azure AD Domain join that took place in VDA.

ContainerScopes.title: ContainerScopeResponseModel[]
ContainerScopes.description:
Delegated admin scopes in which the containers of the
machine reside.

ControllerDnsName.title: String
ControllerDnsName.description:
The DNS host name of the controller that the machine is
registered to.

DeliveryGroup.description:
Delivery group which the machine is a member of.
May be null if the machine is not a member of a
delivery group.

DeliveryType.description: Denotes the type(s) of published resources which the machine may deliver.

DesktopConditions.title: DesktopCondition[]
DesktopConditions.description: List of outstanding desktop conditions for the machine.

DnsName.title: String
DnsName.description: The DNS host name of the machine.

FunctionalLevel.description: Functional level of the machine, if known.

Hosting.description: Details about the hosting of the machine, if the machine is hosted.

InMaintenanceMode.title: Boolean
InMaintenanceMode.description:
Denotes if the machine is in maintenance mode.
Machines in maintenance mode will not accept new sessions.

DrainingUntilShutdown.title: Boolean
DrainingUntilShutdown.description: Denotes if the machine is placed to drain until shutdown

IPAddress.title: String
IPAddress.description: The IP address of the machine.

IsAssigned.title: Boolean
IsAssigned.description:
Denotes whether a private desktop has been assigned to a user/users,
or a client name/address. Users can be assigned explicitly or by
assigning on first use of the machine.
Only relevant for privately assigned machines.

LastConnectionFailure.description:
The reason for the last failed connection between a client and 
the machine.

LastConnectionTime.title: String
LastConnectionTime.description: Time of the last detected connection attempt that either failed or succeeded.

FormattedLastConnectionTime.title: String
FormattedLastConnectionTime.description:
Formatted time of the last detected connection attempt that either failed or succeeded.
RFC 3339 compatible format.

LastConnectionUser.description: The user that last attempted a connection with the machine.

LastDeregistrationReason.description:
The reason for the last deregistration of the machine with
the broker.

LastDeregistrationTime.title: String
LastDeregistrationTime.description: Time of the last deregistration of the machine from the controller.

FormattedLastDeregistrationTime.title: String
FormattedLastDeregistrationTime.description:
Formatted time of the last deregistration of the machine from the controller.
RFC 3339 compatible format.

LastErrorReason.title: String
LastErrorReason.description: The reason for the last error detected in the machine.

LastErrorTime.title: String
LastErrorTime.description: The time of the last detected error.

FormattedLastErrorTime.title: String
FormattedLastErrorTime.description:
The formatted time of the last detected error.
RFC 3339 compatible format.

LoadIndex.title: Int32
LoadIndex.description:
Gives current effective load index.
Only used when SessionSupport
is equal to MultiSession.

MachineUnavailableReason.description: Reason reported from the VDA showing why it is not yet available for use even though it is registered.

OSType.title: String
OSType.description: A string that can be used to identify the operating system that is running on the machine.

OSVersion.title: String
OSVersion.description: A string that can be used to identify the version of the operating system running on the machine, if known.

PersistUserChanges.description: Describes if and how user changes are persisted.

PowerActionPending.title: Boolean
PowerActionPending.description:
Indicates if there are any pending power actions for the machine.
Only relevant for power-managed machines.

PowerState.description: The current power state of the machine.

ProvisioningType.description: Describes how the machine was provisioned.

PublishedName.title: String
PublishedName.description:
The name of the machine that is displayed in Receiver, if the
machine has been published.

RegistrationState.description: Indicates the registration state of the machine.

ScheduledReboot.description: Indicates the state of any scheduled reboot operation for a machine.

SessionClientAddress.title: String
SessionClientAddress.description: The IP address of the client connected to the session.

SessionClientName.title: String
SessionClientName.description: The host name of the client connected to the session.

SessionClientVersion.title: String
SessionClientVersion.description: The version of the Citrix Receiver running on the client connected to the session.

SessionConnectedViaHostName.title: String
SessionConnectedViaHostName.description: The host name of the incoming connection. This is usually a gateway, router or client.

SessionConnectedViaIP.title: String
SessionConnectedViaIP.description: The IP address of the incoming connection This is usually a gateway, router or client.

SessionCount.title: Int32
SessionCount.description: Number of sessions running on the machine.

SessionLaunchedViaHostName.title: String
SessionLaunchedViaHostName.description: The host name of the StoreFront server used to launch the session.

SessionLaunchedViaIP.title: String
SessionLaunchedViaIP.description: The IP address of the StoreFront server used to launch the session.

SessionProtocol.description: The protocol that the session is using.

SessionSecureIcaActive.title: Boolean
SessionSecureIcaActive.description: Indicates whether SecureICA is active on the session.

SessionSmartAccessTags.title: String[]
SessionSmartAccessTags.description: The Smart Access tags for this session.

SessionStartTime.title: String
SessionStartTime.description: The time indicates when the session was started.

FormattedSessionStartTime.title: String
FormattedSessionStartTime.description:
The formatted time indicates when the session was started.
RFC 3339 compatible format.

SessionStateChangeTime.title: String
SessionStateChangeTime.description: The time of the most recent state change for the session.

FormattedSessionStateChangeTime.title: String
FormattedSessionStateChangeTime.description:
The formatted time of the most recent state change for the session.
RFC 3339 compatible format.

SessionSupport.description: Indicates the session support of the machine.

Sid.title: String
Sid.description:
The SID of the machine.
Used to be: DesktopSid or SID (based on the context)

SummaryState.description: Indicates the overall state of the desktop associated with the machine. The overall state is a result of other more specific states such as session state, registration state and power state.

WillShutdownAfterUse.title: Boolean
WillShutdownAfterUse.description:
Flag indicating if this machine is tainted and will be shut down
after all sessions on the machine have ended. This flag is only
ever non-null on power-managed, single-session machines.

WindowsConnectionSetting.description:
The logon mode reported by Windows itself (multi-session machines
only). For single-session machines the value is always hardwired
to LogonEnabled.

Zone.description: The zone in which the machine is located.

SupportedPowerActions.title: SupportedPowerAction[]
SupportedPowerActions.description: A list of power actions supported by this machine.

FaultState.description: Summary state of any current fault state of the machine.

UpgradeType.description: VDA upgrade type of this machine.

UpgradeDetail.description:
Detail about the VDA upgrade schedule status object associated
with this machine.

Id.title: String
Id.description:
Id of machine.
Used to be: DesktopUid (and wasn't globally unique)
OR UUID, depending on context
Needs to be globally unique
Might be constructed from site ID + internal Uid?  or use uuid

MachineCatalog.description: Machine catalog which the machine is a member of.

Name.title: String
Name.description:
DNS host name of the machine.
Used to be: MachineName

RefResponseModel.title: RefResponseModel
RefResponseModel.description: Response object for an object reference.

Id.title: String
Id.description:
Id of the object.
Needs to be globally unique
This is likely to contain a guid but the property type should be string for future flexibility

AllocationType.title: AllocationType
AllocationType.description: Machine allocation type, indicating how machines are allocated to users.

DisplayName.title: String
DisplayName.description:
Display name of the user or group.
Usually something like "John Q. Doe".

SamName.title: String
SamName.description: Fully qualified sAMAccountName of the User or Group object (including domain).

SamAccountName.title: String
SamAccountName.description:
Unqualified SAM name (Directory property) of the User or Group object. 
Does not include the domain. The sAMAccountName is unique within a domain.

CommonName.title: String
CommonName.description: The common name associated with the User or Group object.

PrincipalName.title: String
PrincipalName.description:
The user principal name of a User object.
The UPN must be unique among all security principal
objects within the directory forest.

Oid.title: String
Oid.description: The Object Identifier associated with the User or Group object.

Sid.title: String
Sid.description: The Security Identifier associated with the User or Group object.

GroupSids.title: IList`1
GroupSids.description: Security Identifiers of groups of which the object is a member.

DenyOnlySids.title: IList`1
DenyOnlySids.description: Security Identifiers of resources to which the object is explicitly denied access.

PasswordCanExpire.title: Boolean
PasswordCanExpire.description: Indicates whether the password can expire on this User object.

DaysUntilPasswordExpiry.title: Int64
DaysUntilPasswordExpiry.description: Indicates the number of days before the password can expire on this User object.

IsBuiltIn.title: Boolean
IsBuiltIn.description: Indicates whether this a built-in object.

IsGroup.title: Boolean
IsGroup.description: Indicates whether this is a User or Group object.

Name.title: String
Name.description: The name of the User or Group object.

StreetAddress.title: String
StreetAddress.description: The street address associated with the User object.

City.title: String
City.description: The city associated with the User object.

State.title: String
State.description: The state associated with the User object.

Country.title: String
Country.description: The country associated with the user object.

Mail.title: String
Mail.description: The e-mail address associated with the user object.

TelephoneNumber.title: String
TelephoneNumber.description: The telephone number associated with the user object.

HomePhone.title: String
HomePhone.description: The home telephone number associated with the user object.

Mobile.title: String
Mobile.description: The mobile telephone number associated with the user object.

Enabled.title: Boolean
Enabled.description:
Indicates whether the User object is disabled.
NOTE that this is opposite of the low-level SDK, which has "IsDisabled".
By changing to "Enabled" it avoids a confusing double-negative.  It also
matches all other SDK objects by using "Enabled" rather than "IsEnabled".

Locked.title: Boolean
Locked.description: Indicates whether the User object is locked.

PropertiesFetched.title: UInt32
PropertiesFetched.description: Properties fetched and populated in the User or Group object.  This is a bitfield indicating the fetched properties.

Claims.description: The universal claims of the user object.

Directory.description: The directory context of the user object.

IdentityBaseResponseModel.title: IdentityBaseResponseModel
IdentityBaseResponseModel.description: Base Identity object for User, Machine and Container Identity objects.

Domain.title: String
Domain.description:
The Domain the object belongs to.
NOTE: When doing a forest level search, the domain
property is populated only if the object contains a SID
and the SID was requested as property to be fetched.

Forest.title: String
Forest.description: The forest the object belongs to.

Guid.title: String
Guid.description:
The GUID of the object, the GUID is unique
across the enterprise and anywhere else.

DistinguishedName.title: String
DistinguishedName.description:
The Distinguished name of the object. Distinguished names (DNs)
are unique and they unambiguously identify objects in the directory.

CanonicalName.title: String
CanonicalName.description: The unique distinguished name of the object in canonical format.

PossibleLookupFailure.title: Boolean
PossibleLookupFailure.description:
Set to True during a bulk identity lookup operation.
For individual identity lookup, usually an exception will be thrown.

DirectoryServer.title: String
DirectoryServer.description: Domain controller that performed the add/update operation on this object

IdentityProvider.description: Identity provider type of the directory.

AzureAdJoinedMode.title: AzureAdJoinedMode
AzureAdJoinedMode.description: Azure AD joined type for machines

ContainerScopeResponseModel.title: ContainerScopeResponseModel
ContainerScopeResponseModel.description: Response object for delegated admin container scopes.

ScopeType.description: Type of the container providing the scopes.

ContainerScopeType.title: ContainerScopeType
ContainerScopeType.description: The type of a container, relevant to delegated administration.

DeliveryKind.title: DeliveryKind
DeliveryKind.description: Types of resources delivered from a delivery group.

MachineHostingResponseModel.title: MachineHostingResponseModel
MachineHostingResponseModel.description: Response model for machine hosting details.

HostedMachineId.title: String
HostedMachineId.description: Unique ID within the hosting unit of the target managed machine.

HostedMachineName.title: String
HostedMachineName.description:
The friendly name of a hosted machine as used by its hypervisor.
This is not necessarily the DNS name of the machine.

HostingServerName.title: String
HostingServerName.description: DNS name of the hypervisor that is hosting the machine.

LastHostingUpdateTime.title: String
LastHostingUpdateTime.description:
Time of last update to any hosting data (such as power
states) for this machine reported by the hypervisor
connection.

FormattedLastHostingUpdateTime.title: String
FormattedLastHostingUpdateTime.description:
Formatted time of last update to any hosting data (such as power
states) for this machine reported by the hypervisor
connection.
RFC 3339 compatible format.

HypervisorConnection.description:
The hypervisor connection that the machines hosting server
is accessed through.

ImageOutOfDate.title: Boolean
ImageOutOfDate.description:
Indicates whether the machine image matches the latest
image specified for the machine catalog.

ConnectionFailureReason.title: ConnectionFailureReason
ConnectionFailureReason.description: The reason why the last connection failure occurred.

DeregistrationReason.title: DeregistrationReason
DeregistrationReason.description: Reasons why a machine may have deregistered from a broker.

MachineUnavailableReason.title: MachineUnavailableReason
MachineUnavailableReason.description: Azure AD join type for machines

PersistChanges.title: PersistChanges
PersistChanges.description: Methods by which changes are persisted on a machine.

SummaryState.title: SummaryState
SummaryState.description: Overall summary state of the desktop associated with a machine.

SupportedPowerAction.title: SupportedPowerAction
SupportedPowerAction.description: Power actions which may be supported by a machine.

ContainerMetadataModel.title: ContainerMetadataModel
ContainerMetadataModel.description: About model of Container metadata for machine.

ContainerType.description: Indicates if the  current environment is cloud.

VdaUpgradeState.title: VdaUpgradeState
VdaUpgradeState.description: Machine catalog or machine state for VDA package upgrade actions.

MachineUpgradeDetail.title: MachineUpgradeDetail
MachineUpgradeDetail.description: Status detail of last VDA upgrade schedule for a machine.

Uuid.title: String
Uuid.description: Uuid of this upgrade status object.

ScheduleStatus.description: State of this upgrade status object. Exact type TBD.

StatusMessage.title: String
StatusMessage.description: Status message resulted from the action of this upgrade status object.

LastStateChangeTimeUtc.title: String
LastStateChangeTimeUtc.description:
UTC time when this upgrade status object changed status
for the last time.

ScheduledTimeUtc.title: String
ScheduledTimeUtc.description: UTC time when this VDA upgrade is scheduled to start.

DurationInHours.title: Int32
DurationInHours.description: Timeout duration in hours, of the current VDA upgrade schdeule.

TargetPackageVersion.title: String
TargetPackageVersion.description: Target package version of the current VDA upgrade schdeule.

ErrorResponse.title: ErrorResponse
ErrorResponse.description: Common error response model mandated by API guidelines

type.title: String
type.description:
URI that indicates the type of error that occurred (need not be actually accessible).
The format is: https://errors-api.cloud.com/{service}/{error}

detail.title: String
detail.description: Human-readable description of the error that occurred, localized into the caller's language.

parameters.title: IList`1
parameters.description: Additional properties that an automated client may need in order to property detect and handle the error.

ErrorResponseParameter.title: ErrorResponseParameter
ErrorResponseParameter.description: Name/Value pair model used in ErrorResponse model

allOf.description: Add a machine to a machine catalog.

PvsAddress.title: String
PvsAddress.description:
IP address of the PVS server to be used.  This only applies if the
ProvisioningType is PVS.

PvsDomain.title: String
PvsDomain.description:
The domain of the PVS server to be used.
This only applies if the ProvisioningType is
PVS.

PvsCollectionIds.title: String[]
PvsCollectionIds.description:
Collection IDs of PVS collections containing machines that should be
added to the catalog.  This only applies if the
ProvisioningType is
PVS, and is required in that case.

Each item must be a valid PVS collection ID residing on the PVS
server located at the specified .

MachineAccountCreationRules.description:
If specified, the machine account creation rules will be updated.
If not specified, the machine account creation rules will be left unchanged.

AddAvailableMachineAccount.description: Active Directory machine account to add to the pool of available accounts that are to be used when machines are provisioned.

AddMachineToMachineCatalogRequestModel.title: AddMachineToMachineCatalogRequestModel
AddMachineToMachineCatalogRequestModel.description: Add a machine to a machine catalog.

MachineName.title: String
MachineName.description: Specify the name of the machine to create (in the form 'domain\machine').  A SID can also be specified.

AssignedClientName.title: String
AssignedClientName.description:
The client name to which this machine will be assigned.  Machines can be assigned to
multiple users, a single client IP address, or a single client name, but only to one
of these categories at a time.

AssignedIPAddress.title: String
AssignedIPAddress.description:
The client IP address to which this machine will be assigned.  Machines can be assigned
to multiple users, a single client IP address, or a single client name, but only to
one of these categories at a time.

AssignedUsers.title: String[]
AssignedUsers.description:
The user(s) to whom this machine will be assigned.  Machines can be assigned
to multiple users, a single client IP address, or a single client name, but only to
one of these categories at a time.

HostedMachineId.title: String
HostedMachineId.description:
The unique ID by which the hypervisor recognizes the machine.
Omit this for machines that are not power-managed.

HypervisorConnection.title: String
HypervisorConnection.description: Hypervisor connection to use for power management of the machine.

InMaintenanceMode.title: Boolean
InMaintenanceMode.description:
Specifies whether the machine is initially in maintenance mode.  A machine in maintenance mode is
not available for new sessions, and for managed machines all automatic power management is disabled.
Optional; default is `false`.

UpdateMachineAccountCreationRulesRequest.title: UpdateMachineAccountCreationRulesRequestModel
UpdateMachineAccountCreationRulesRequest.description: Updates to machine account creation rules.

NamingScheme.title: String
NamingScheme.description:
Defines the template name for AD accounts created in the identity pool.


If this is not specified, it will remain unchanged.


If the provisioning scheme is configured with a NamingScheme already,
and this value is set to an empty string, the provisioning scheme will
be reconfigured so that it will no longer automatically create machine
accounts.

NamingSchemeType.description:
The type of naming scheme. This defines the format of the variable part of the AD account names that will be created.


If not specified, will not be changed.


Cannot be specified if  is set to an empty string.


If  was not previously set, but is being set now, then the default if not specified is .

OU.title: String
OU.description:
The OU that computer accounts will be created into.


If not specified, will not be changed.


Cannot be specified if  is set to an empty string.


If  was not previously set, but is being set now, then use the default account container specified by AD.
This is the `Computers` container for out-of-the-box installations of AD.

Domain.title: String
Domain.description:
The AD domain name for the pool. Specify this in FQDN format; for example, MyDomain.com.


If not specified, will not be changed.


Cannot be specified if  is set to an empty string.


If  was not previously set, but is being set now, this property is required.

NextValue.title: String
NextValue.description:
Defines the next value that will be used if creating new AD accounts.


If not specified, will not be changed.


Cannot be specified if  is set to an empty string.


If  was not previously set, but is being set now, the default is a sequence of `0`s or `A`s,
depending on the .

MachineAccountRequestModel.title: MachineAccountRequestModel
MachineAccountRequestModel.description: Active directory machine account which was externally created.

ADAccountName.title: String
ADAccountName.description: The Active Directory account name to be imported.

ResetPassword.title: Boolean
ResetPassword.description: Indicates whether the machine account password should be reset.

Password.title: String
Password.description:
The current password for the machine account , in the format specified by
PasswordFormat.

PasswordFormat.description: The format of the machine account password.

NamingSchemeType.title: NamingSchemeType
NamingSchemeType.description: Naming scheme type for creating machine account names during provisioning.

IdentityPasswordFormat.title: IdentityPasswordFormat
IdentityPasswordFormat.description: Supported formats for specifying a password.

JobResponseModel.title: JobResponseModel
JobResponseModel.description: Response object indicating status of an asynchronous job.

Id.title: String
Id.description: Id of the job in progress.

Type.description: Type of job that is being performed.

OverallProgressPercent.title: Int32
OverallProgressPercent.description:
Overall progress percent; 0..100.
May be null if the job does not support progress reporting.

IsCancellable.title: Boolean
IsCancellable.description:
Indicates whether the job may be cancelled.
DeleteJob

Parameters.title: NameValueStringPairModel[]
Parameters.description:
Indicators to the caller about what object(s) the job
is affecting.  Consult the documentation for APIs that
initiate jobs to see the properties expected to be present.

SubJobs.title: JobResponseModel[]
SubJobs.description: List of sub-jobs contained within the job.

Status.description: State of the job or subjob.

ResultLocation.title: String
ResultLocation.description: URL where the job results can be obtained.

ErrorString.title: String
ErrorString.description:
If a job or subjob failed, this will be the reason why
the failure occurred, presented in a human-readable
format.

ErrorCode.description:
If a job or subjob failed, this will be the reason why
the failure occurred.

ErrorParameters.title: NameValueStringPairModel[]
ErrorParameters.description:
If a job or subjob failed, this will be information
about related objects that were involved in the
failure.

CreationTime.title: String
CreationTime.description: Time when the job was created.

FormattedCreationTime.title: String
FormattedCreationTime.description:
Formatted time when the job was created.
RFC 3339 compatible format.

StartTime.title: String
StartTime.description:
Time when the job was started.
Will be null if the job has not yet started.

FormattedStartTime.title: String
FormattedStartTime.description:
Formatted time when the job was started.
Will be null if the job has not yet started.
RFC 3339 compatible format.

EndTime.title: String
EndTime.description:
Time when the job was completed.
Will be null if the job has not yet completed.

FormattedEndTime.title: String
FormattedEndTime.description:
Formatted time when the job was completed.
Will be null if the job has not yet completed.
RFC 3339 compatible format.

JobType.title: JobType
JobType.description: Types of long-running jobs that may be executing.

NameValueStringPairModel.title: NameValueStringPairModel
NameValueStringPairModel.description: A name/value pair, with the value of (JSON) type String.

JobErrorCode.title: JobErrorCode
JobErrorCode.description: Possible error codes returned from a job.
